content:
clustermesh-apiserver kvstoremesh-dbg status 
 Display status of remote clusters 
 clustermesh-apiserver kvstoremesh-dbg status [flags]
 
 Options 
   -h, --help            help for status
  -o, --output string   json| yaml| jsonpath='{}'
      --verbose         Output verbose status information for ready clusters as well
 
 Options inherited from parent commands 
   -H, --host string   URI to server-side API (default "localhost:9889")
 
 SEE ALSO 
 
 clustermesh-apiserver kvstoremesh-dbg 	 - CLI for interacting with KVStoreMesh
